mapper.select: select C.challenge_code, fk_category_code, G.category_name as category_name, challenge_name, content, C.regDate, challenge_exp, member_count, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, F.frequency, fk_during_type, D.set_date, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, C.fk_userid, to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start, to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end, success_img, fail_img, example, startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7) as enddate, U.profile_pic from tbl_challenge C join tbl_category G on G.category_code = C.fk_category_code join tbl_user U on C.fk_userid = U.userid join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code left join tbl_certify_exam E on E.challenge_code = C.challenge_code where C.challenge_code = #{challengeCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_challenge (challenge_code, fk_category_code, challenge_name, content, regDate, challenge_exp, member_count, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, fk_during_type, startDate, fk_userid) VALUES (challenge_code_seq.nextval, to_number(#{fkCategoryCode}), #{challengeName}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, sysdate, #{challengeExp}, 0, #{thumbnail}, to_number(#{fkFreqType}), to_number(#{fkDuringType}), to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{fkUserid})
INSERT INTO tbl_certify_hour (challenge_code, hour_start, hour_end) VALUES (challenge_code_seq.currval, to_date(#{hourStart}, 'hh24:mi'), to_date(#{hourEnd}, 'hh24:mi'))
INSERT INTO tbl_certify_exam(challenge_code, success_img, fail_img, example) VALUES (challenge_code_seq.currval, #{successImg}, #{failImg}, #{example})
